Frederick Oliver Robinson, 2nd Marquess of Ripon GCVO (29 January 1852 – 23 September 1923), styled Viscount Goderich between 1859 and 1870 and Earl de Grey between 1870 and 1909, was a British courtier and Liberal politician.
